name: Bon Appetit ♪ Chisato
text: 【CONT】 If a climax with [[choice.gif]] in its trigger icon is in your climax area, this card in all of your zones gets [[choice.gif]] in the trigger icon. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 "Business Crisis for Café LycoReco" or "Whatever Your Order Is, Leave It All up to Us ♪" from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your hand has 6 or less cards, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Business Crisis for Café LycoReco" or "Whatever Your Order Is, Leave It All up to Us ♪" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Chisato in Gym Clothes
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, perform the following action 2 times. "Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck or into your waiting room."

name: Getting Ready for Business, Chisato
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 characters you have ×1000.

name: Capable Newbie Accountant, Takina
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 other character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 climax, reveal it to your opponent, choose up to 1 climax in your hand, reveal it to your opponent, exchange them, and shuffle your deck.

name: Chisato Waking Up
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", all characters in battle get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】." 【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 0, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +0 power until end of turn)

name: Bon Appetit ♪ Takina
text: 【CONT】 If you would pay the 【ACT】 cost for your "Café LycoReco, Takina", you may put this card from your hand into your waiting room instead of 1 or 2 cards from your stock. 【ACT】 [Put this card into your waiting room] Search your deck for up to 1 "Shrewd Accountant, Takina", put it in the stage position that this card was in, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] If your level is 2 or higher, choose 1 "Café LycoReco, Takina" in your waiting room, and put it in the stage position that this card was in.

name: Safe Travels, Takina
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 characters you have ×1000. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 2, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: Moments Before Disaster, Kurumi
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 "Great Achievement" from your climax area into your waiting room] If this card is in your waiting room, at the beginning of your encore step, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to your hand. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)

name: Etiquette of a Lady, Mizuki
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's level 1 or higher characters, your opponent chooses 1 level X or lower character in their waiting room, and exchanges them. X is equal to the level of the character you chose -1.

name: Ultimate New Dish, Takina
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put up to 1 card from the top of your clock into your waiting room, and this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if you have another 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to 2 cards from among them, put them on the top of their deck in any order, and put the rest into their waiting room.

name: Final Duty, Chisato
text: 【CONT】 You cannot receive 4 or more damage by the 【AUTO】 effects of your opponent's characters. 【CONT】 All of your other 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 card in your level and 1 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character in your waiting room, and exchange them.

name: Obligation of a Lycoris, Chisato
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: "Noriko Wasabi" Chisato
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Enjoying the Summer Festival, Chisato
text: 【AUTO】 Bond/"Enjoying the Summer Festival, Takina" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Enjoying the Summer Festival, Takina" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand) 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character in your hand and 1 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character in your level, and exchange them.

name: Encountering Tiny Bits of Happiness, Chisato
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent's center stage has 1 or less characters, you may choose 1 cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it into their waiting room. 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your stock.

name: "Are You in Trouble?" Chisato
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, if this card is in your center stage, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is level 1 or higher, return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0) 【AUTO】 Experience [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if "Oozing Bloodthirst, Takina" is in your level, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Night Drinking Routine, Mizuki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 climax from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. If you put 1 card into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: Changing Seasons, Chisato
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +5000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "Changing Seasons, Takina" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may choose 1 marker underneath this card, and return it to your hand.

name: Under the Falling Cherry Blossoms, Takina & Chisato
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Cherry Blossoms in Full Bloom" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have another 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character, search your deck for up to 1 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Sharing the Summer, Chisato
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character attacks, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Experience [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or attacks, if the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Halloween Costume, Chisato
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of characters your opponent has ×500. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 1 of your other "Autumn Dyed in Red, Takina & Chisato"] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Scene at the Aquarium, Chisato
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. During your main phase, when your other "Encouraging Takina" is placed on the stage from your hand, 【STAND】 this card. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn. 【ACT】 [Put 1 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Draw 1 card.

name: Shisa Pose, Chisato
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When your climax with in its trigger icon triggers, your opponent puts the top 4 cards of their deck into their waiting room, if there are no markers underneath this card, choose up to 1 card in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker. 【ACT】 [(1) Put 1 marker underneath this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand.

name: We'll Solve Everything! Chisato
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the top X cards of your deck or your opponent's deck into the waiting room. X is equal to the number of climax with in its trigger icon in your waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: Reason to Act, Chisato
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn. 【ACT】 [Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand.

name: Final Fight, Chisato
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 "Persisting With Her Thoughts" from your climax area into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 [Put 1 "Before the End, Chisato" from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Tropical Girl, Chisato
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent returns all cards from their stock to their deck, shuffles their deck, and puts the same number of cards from the top of their deck into their stock. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: Fireworks Festival, Chisato & Takina
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Two Esteemed Shooters" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent, your opponent puts the top 10 cards of their deck into their waiting room, and this card gets +4000 power until end of turn. (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage by the effect, you may return this card to your hand.

name: For an Ideal World, Majima
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 "My Definition of Justice, Majima" from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(3) Put 3 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Cutting Ties" is in your climax area, and all players are level 3 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, all players put all cards from their clock into their waiting rooms, you deal 4 damage to your opponent, and this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. (Damage may be canceled)

name: The Daily Life They Protected
text: [Put 1 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character from your hand into your waiting room] If you have a 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, shuffle your deck, choose 1 of your 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: Cherry Blossoms in Full Bloom
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Two Esteemed Shooters
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

name: My Duty, Takina
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 trait of a character in your opponent's stage, and all of your opponent's characters lose all of that chosen trait until end of turn.

name: Obligation of a Lycoris, Takina
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +1 soul. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Peaceful Daily Life, Takina
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your clock, and return it to your hand. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your clock. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax with in its trigger icon from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: My Everything, Kurumi
text: 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and your opponent puts that character from their memory in any position of their stage.

name: Tropical Girl, Takina
text: 【CONT】 You can put up to 4 cards with the same card name as this card and cards named "1st Lycoris, Fuki" in your deck. 【AUTO】 When your character direct attacks, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [Put this card into your clock] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Restraining Stance, Takina
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, if this card is 【REST】, put this card into your memory. If you do, at the beginning of your next draw phase, choose 1 "Restraining Stance, Takina" in your memory, and put it in any position of your stage. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: "Taro Kabayaki" Takina
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [Return this card to your hand] When a climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Meeting Up, Takina
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 3 or less cards, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, and shuffle your deck.

name: Autumn Dyed in Red, Takina & Chisato
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Perfect Day for Camping" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your back stage, and you have 3 or more other 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 characters in your center stage, you may choose 1 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: At Dusk, Takina
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 other 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 Experience When this card attacks, if the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Halloween Costume, Takina
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Experience When this card attacks, if the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your stock. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Changing Seasons, Takina
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +10000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 2 "Changing Seasons, Chisato" in your waiting room, and put them face up underneath this card in any order as markers. 【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is canceled, choose up to 2 markers underneath this card, and put them at the bottom of your stock in any order.

name: Reason to Fight, Takina
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: First Dress-Up, Takina
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +4000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【ACT】 Resonate [Reveal 1 "Enjoying the Summer Festival, Takina" in your hand & 【REST】 this card] Your opponent puts the top 4 cards of their deck into their waiting room.

name: Unfamiliar Uniform, Takina
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 2 of your opponent's characters, and those characters get the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position of the stage." 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: In Charge of Cooking, Takina
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, choose 1 of your "Unpredictable Attack, Chisato" or "Fireworks Festival, Chisato & Takina", and that character gets +1000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step."

name: Enjoying the Summer Festival, Takina
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Draw up to 2 cards, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room." "[Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] You may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock." 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have another 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: Snowy Night, Chisato & Takina
text: 【CONT】 Experience If "Snowy Night, Chisato & Takina" is in your level, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "Snowy Night, Chisato & Takina" in your level and 1 character in your stage, and exchange them. (The character is placed on your stage as 【STAND】) 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Exploring the Stars" is in your climax area, and you have another 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Chance for a Bite! Takina & Chisato
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "Days Spent Together" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, at the beginning of your climax phase, if you do not have another "Chance for a Bite! Takina & Chisato", you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, choose up to 1 "Days That'll Continue On, Chisato" and up to 1 "Days That'll Continue On, Takina" in your hand, put them in separate positions of your stage, shuffle your deck, and those characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play events from their hand."

name: Peek Into the Mismatched Duo's Lives
text: 【COUNTER】 If you have 2 or less 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 characters, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose up to 1 of your 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot become 【REVERSE】." [Put 1 《LycoReco》 or 《Weapon》 character from your hand into your waiting room] You may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -1 soul until end of turn.

name: Perfect Day for Camping
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Exploring the Stars
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
